data.lyric:
[ti:Dancing With A Stranger]
[ar:Sam Smith/Normani]
[al:Dancing With A Stranger]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Dancing With A Stranger - Sam Smith (山姆·史密斯)/Normani
[00:00.25]Lyrics by：Jimmy Napes/Mikkel S. Eriksen/Tor Hermansen/Sam Smith/Normani Hamilton
[00:00.51]Composed by：Jimmy Napes/Mikkel S. Eriksen/Tor Hermansen/Sam Smith/Normani Hamilton
[00:00.76]Sam Smith：
[00:01.66]Hmm mhm
[00:07.94]I don't wanna be alone tonight
[00:10.80]'Lone tonight
[00:12.33]It's pretty clear that I'm not over you
[00:15.64]Over you
[00:17.29]I'm still thinking 'bout the things you do
[00:20.79]Things you do
[00:21.58]So I don't wanna be alone tonight alone tonight alone tonight
[00:27.79]Can you light the fire
[00:29.40]Light the fire light the fire
[00:31.03]I need somebody who can take control
[00:34.32]Take control
[00:35.53]I know exactly what I need to do
[00:40.30]'Cause I don't wanna be alone tonight alone tonight alone tonight
[00:46.82]And look what you made me do I'm with somebody new
[00:51.65]Ooh baby baby I'm dancing with a stranger
[00:56.27]Look what you made me do I'm with somebody new
[01:00.97]Ooh baby baby I'm dancing with a stranger
[01:07.66]Dancing with a stranger
[01:10.77]Normani：
[01:12.96]I wasn't even going out tonight
[01:16.14]Out tonight
[01:17.50]But boy I need to get you off of my mind
[01:20.78]Off of my mind
[01:22.28]I know exactly what I have to do
[01:27.11]I don't wanna be alone tonight alone tonight alone tonight
[01:32.35]Normani/Sam Smith：
[01:33.49]Look what you made me do I'm with somebody new
[01:38.27]Ooh baby baby I'm dancing with a stranger
[01:42.91]Look what you made me do I'm with somebody new
[01:47.43]Ooh baby baby I'm dancing with a stranger
[01:54.38]Dancing with a stranger
[01:58.95]Dancing with a stranger
[02:03.48]Dancing oh yeah
[02:05.23]Ooh yeah
[02:10.78]Look what you made me do I'm with somebody new
[02:15.56]Ooh baby baby I'm dancing with a stranger
[02:20.16]Look what you made me do I'm with somebody new
[02:24.84]Ooh baby baby I'm dancing with a stranger
[02:30.13]I'm dancing I'm dancing ooh
[02:34.88]I'm dancing I'm dancing
[02:36.48]Dancing with a stranger
[02:39.41]I'm dancing I'm dancing
[02:41.16]Dancing with a stranger
[02:44.10]I'm dancing I'm dancing
[02:45.80]Dancing with a stranger
data.trans:
[ti:与陌生人翩然共舞]
[ar:Sam Smith/Normani]
[al:与陌生人翩然共舞]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.50]//
[00:00.76]//
[00:01.66]//
[00:07.94]今夜我不愿孤身一人
[00:10.80]今夜品尝孤独
[00:12.33]很显然我依然无法将你忘怀
[00:15.64]将你忘怀
[00:17.29]我依然想念你的所作所为
[00:20.79]你的所作所为
[00:21.58]所以今晚我不愿孤独一人
[00:27.79]你能否点亮那爱的烛火
[00:29.40]点亮火光 点亮火光
[00:31.03]我需要有个能将我掌控的人
[00:34.32]将我掌控
[00:35.53]我清楚我心底的渴望
[00:40.30]因为今夜我不愿品尝孤独 品尝孤独
[00:46.82]看看你对我都做了些什么 我已另觅新欢
[00:51.65]噢 亲爱的 我与个陌生人翩然共舞
[00:56.27]看看你对我都做了些什么 我已另觅新欢
[01:00.97]噢 亲爱的 我与个陌生人翩然共舞
[01:07.66]与陌生人翩然共舞
[01:10.77]//
[01:12.96]今夜我并不想出门
[01:16.14]今夜出门
[01:17.50]但宝贝 我需要将你驱逐出我的脑海
[01:20.78]驱逐出我的脑海
[01:22.28]我明白我必须做什么
[01:27.11]今夜我不愿孤身一人 品尝孤独
